Uses of Package
org.jnosql.diana.api.column

  • Packages that use org.jnosql.diana.api.column 
    Package Description
    org.jnosql.diana.api.column
    This package contains all objects to use a Column Family API.
    org.jnosql.diana.api.column.query
    This package has the DSL domain to create both ColumnQuery and ColumnDeleteQuery
  • Classes in org.jnosql.diana.api.column used by org.jnosql.diana.api.column 
    Class and Description
    Column
    A Column Family entity unit, it is a tuple (pair) that consists of a key-value pair, where the key is mapped to a value.
    ColumnCondition
    An unit condition to run a column family select
    ColumnConfiguration
    The diana configuration to create a ColumnFamilyManagerFactory
    ColumnConfigurationAsync
    The diana configuration to create a ColumnFamilyManagerAsyncFactory
    ColumnDeleteQuery
    A unit that has the columnFamily and condition to delete from conditions.
    ColumnEntity
    A column family is a NoSQL object that contains columns of related data.
    ColumnFamilyManager
    Interface used to interact with the persistence context to ColumnEntity The ColumnFamilyManager API is used to create and remove persistent ColumnEntity instances, to select entities by their primary key, and to select over entities.
    ColumnFamilyManagerAsync
    Interface used to interact with the persistence context to ColumnEntity The ColumnFamilyManager API is used to create and remove persistent ColumnEntity instances, to select entities by their primary key, and to select over entities.
    ColumnFamilyManagerAsyncFactory
    ColumnFamilyManager factory.
    ColumnFamilyManagerFactory
    ColumnFamilyManager factory.
    ColumnQuery
    Class that contains information to do a select to ColumnEntity
  • Classes in org.jnosql.diana.api.column used by org.jnosql.diana.api.column.query 
    Class and Description
    ColumnCondition
    An unit condition to run a column family select
    ColumnDeleteQuery
    A unit that has the columnFamily and condition to delete from conditions.
    ColumnQuery
    Class that contains information to do a select to ColumnEntity
